title: GETTYSBURG: CULP'S HILL - North & South: American Civil War Mod Gameplay
description:
Battle of Gettysburg - Day 2 - July 2, 1863

After the first day of battle, Union forces had to retreat to more defensive positions.  They dug themselves in at Culp's Hill, and were outnumbered 3 to 1.  On july 2, 1863 around 5pm confederate forces began to assault Culp's Hill.  The battle carried on to the 3rd day of battle, but by then the Union outnumbered the rebels 3 to 1. The Union defenses held! Enjoy :D

Here's some music to put you in the Mood: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k-s51B66Sl4

Jackie's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh

You can download the mod here: http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?670856-Release-North-amp-South-American-Civil-War-Version-1-0-October-24-2014


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
